title: Encrypted compute disk with unmanaged keys.
description: By default, Compute Engine encrypts all data at rest. Compute Engine handles and manages this encryption for you without any additional actions on your part. If the disk_encryption_key block is included in the resource declaration then it *must* include a raw_key or kms_key_self_link.

custom.possibleImpact: Encryption of disk using unmanaged keys.
